cast.name: 麦卡·霍普特曼 Micah Hauptman
斯科特·迈克尔·福斯特 Scott Michael Foster

writer.name: 大卫·夏彭尼尔 David Charbonier
贾斯汀·鲍威尔 Justin Powell

director.name: 大卫·夏彭尼尔 David Charbonier
贾斯汀·鲍威尔 Justin Powell

introduction: A night of unimaginable terror awaits twelve-year-old, Bobby, and his best friend, Kevin, when they are abducted on their way home from school.Managing to escape his confines, Bobby navigates the dark halls, praying his presence goes unnoticed as he avoids his captor at every turn. Even worse is the arrival of another deranged stranger, whose mysterious arrangement with the kidnapper may spell certain doom for Kevin.With no means of calling for help and miles of dark country in every direction, Bobby approaches a difficult crossroad: take his chances in the fields, or find a means to free his friend. Unable to leave Kevin behind, Bobby embarks on a rescue mission, determined to get them both out alive… or die trying.
